author: Radar Staff
title: Scheana Shay's New Boyfriend Revealed!
text:
Getty Images 
Scheana Shay isn’t fully divorced yet, but she’s already in a relationship! 
RadarOnline.com can exclusively reveal that the Vanderpump Rules star has been dating Los Angeles based actor Robert Parks Valletta . 
An insider close to the SURver told Radar exclusively that Shay was at the SLS Hotel with Valletta, and introducing him as her boyfriend! 
The couple has been spotted together at Universal Studios, and Shay even teased a photo of the pair on her Instagram story from one of their trips. 
Shay, 31, has been dating Valletta, 35, for months — and even celebrated the holidays with his family. A post shared by Robert Parks Valletta (@robsvalletta) on Dec 14, 2016 at 3:00pm PST 
The reality star confirmed that she was in a relationship to Andy Cohen on Watch What Happens Live just weeks ago, saying that Cohen met the “very tall” man before the show and that he isn’t a “secret to [her] friends.” 
Shay’s divorce is currently pending a judge’s approval. 
Stay with Radar for more.
